Package com.xebisco.yield

Class PlatformInit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.PlatformInit
  • public class PlatformInit
extends java.lang.Object
    It's a class that holds the initial configuration of the specific platform.

        windowIcon - The parameter "windowIcon" is a Texture object that represents the icon of a window in a Yield application. The method "setWindowIcon" sets the value of the windowIcon instance variable to the value passed as a parameter.

      • setStartPhysicsPpm

        public void setStartPhysicsPpm​(int startPhysicsPpm)
        This is a method that sets the value of a variable called "startPhysicsPpm".
        Parameters:
        startPhysicsPpm - startPhysicsPpm is a variable of type integer that represents the starting value of the physics pixels per meter (ppm) for the physics simulation.

      • isInvertZIndex

        public boolean isInvertZIndex()
        The function returns the value of the boolean variable invertZIndex.
        Returns:
        The method `isInvertZIndex()` is returning a boolean value, which is the value of the variable `invertZIndex`.

      • setInvertZIndex

        public void setInvertZIndex​(boolean invertZIndex)
        This function sets the value of a boolean variable called invertZIndex.
        Parameters:
        invertZIndex - The parameter "invertZIndex" is a boolean variable that determines whether the Z-index of an element should be inverted or not. If set to true, the Z-index will be inverted, meaning that elements with a higher Z-index will appear in front elements with a lower Z-index.
